scripts.generate-unicornstore-stack: cd ./cdk && mvn clean package && cdk synth && cdk synth unicornstore-stack --yaml --path-metadata false --version-reporting false | sed 's/arn:aws:iam::{{.AccountId}}:/!Sub arn:aws:iam::${AWS::AccountId}:/g' > ../cfn/unicornstore-stack.yaml

scripts.sync-workshops-stacks: cp cfn/unicornstore-stack.yaml ../../java-on-amazon-eks/static/ && cp cfn/unicornstore-stack.yaml ../../java-on-aws-immersion-day/static/ && cp cfn/spring-ai-stack.yaml ../../java-spring-ai-agents/static/workshop-stack.yaml
scripts.sync-workshops-policy: cp cdk/src/main/resources/iam-policy.json ../../java-on-amazon-eks/static/ && cp cdk/src/main/resources/iam-policy.json ../../java-on-aws-immersion-day/static/ && cp cdk/src/main/resources/iam-policy.json ../../java-spring-ai-agents/static/
